text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ecr/CodeSystem/executabletask-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
start Encounter StartThis action represents the start of an Encounter upon matching of a trigger code to one of the values in the eRSD value sets.
check-reportable Check ReportableThis action represents the check for suspected reportability of the eICR.
create-and-report-eicr Create And Report eICRThis action represents creation and reporting of the eICR.
create-eicr Create eICRThe task represents the initial creation of the eICR.
validate-eicr Validate eICRThe task carries out validation of an eICR.
route-and-send-eicr Route and Send eICRThe task represents the routing and sending of an eICR.
report-eicr Report eICRThis action represents the reporting of the eICR.

name: CodeSystem_ExecutableTask_Types
title: Executable Task Types Code System
description: This code system contains codes that describe the executable task types.

concept.definition: This action represents the start of an Encounter upon matching of a trigger code to one of the values in the eRSD value sets.
This action represents the check for suspected reportability of the eICR.
This action represents creation and reporting of the eICR.
The task represents the initial creation of the eICR.
The task carries out validation of an eICR.
The task represents the routing and sending of an eICR.
This action represents the reporting of the eICR.
